page.title: 20Memorial to Dr. MacMillan
page.content:
Dr MacMillan was born in Scotland.He came to New Tredegar in about 1930.Dr. MacMillan worked with Dr. Carmicheal and Dr. Shea. Dr. McMillan was about 27 years old when he started work in New Tredegar. He had two children called Neil and Jean. Dr. MacMillan was 64 years old when he died.He was born in 1891 and died in 1955.There was a memorial built to his memory,a Town Clock.
Nearly everybody in New Tredegar gave something towards the clock as he was such a good and popular doctor and no amount of work was too much trouble for him.He would come out in the middle of the night if anyone was ill. The clock cost Â£120.00.It now stands in Elliot's Town square Elliot's Way.
